CBMRtools

ggheat.continuous

ggheat.continuous helper function for plotting ggheatmap, see ggheat.continuous.single and ggheat.continuous.group for examples of usage

ggheat.continuous(eset, hc = NA, hr = NA, hmcolors = NA, col_lab,
  col_values, col_breaks, col_labels, ylabstr = "", type = c("left",
  "right", "middle", "regular"), fout = NA, p.heights = c(1.5, 0.5, 5),
  xsize = 4, ysize = 4, ysizelab = 7)
